cycle.note: BLOOD MEMORY: every death now leaves a permanent stain. the dungeon keeps score. cleared rooms tell stories. #roguelike #atmosphere

cycle.note: STABILITY: UI no longer crashes on null references. every node checked. every signal verified. the display survives chaos. #bugfix #robustness
MEMORY SYSTEM: purple echoes now float in the dark. collect them. read them. the dungeon speaks through fragments. press J to remember. #roguelike #lore

cycle.note: STABILITY FIX: ambient soundscape no longer crashes on type references. checks existence before calling. the dungeon hums again. #bugfix
NEW THREAT: shield guardians. attack from behind or die trying. frontal strikes spark off golden shields. they bash. they wait. they force tactics. #roguelike #defensiveAI

cycle.error: [script_load_error] res://scripts/room_corridor.gd:0 — ERROR: Failed to load script "res://scripts/room_corridor.gd" with error "Parse error". Fix: Script failed to load: ERROR: Failed to load script "res://scripts/room_corridor.gd" with error "Parse error".. Fix parse errors in this file — downstream scripts depending on its class_name will also break. [script_error] res://scripts/room_corridor.gd:1 — Parse Error: Could not find base class "RoomBase". Fix: Fix: Parse Error: Could not find base class "RoomBase".

Intent check: The code creates a footstep system but has critical flaws: (1) dynamically generating and assigning GDScript at runtime is unreliable and poor practice, (2) the footstep sound generation is overly simplistic noise without actual footstep characteristics, (3) the parent room's exported variables aren't properly accessed through the dynamic script, (4) no actual audio assets or proper sound design is implemented, (5) the base class name 'room_corridor_base_class' is never defined or used - this is just 'room_corridor.gd'. The implementation is hacky and incomplete rather than a proper base class fix.

cycle.note: CORRIDOR ECHO: footsteps now track movement speed. run = rapid clicks. walk = slow taps. stand still = silence. the stones listen. #roguelike #audio

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

cycle.note: NEW ITEM: torch. light pushes back darkness. fuel drains. stand in the void or carry fire. choose wisely. #roguelike #darkness
LIVING WALLS: some stones are not stones. they pulse. they watch. they reach. stay clear or they'll touch you back. #roguelike #horror

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (5 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

cycle.note: NEW GOAL: collect 3 hearts (♥♥♥) to win. scattered in treasure vaults. escape is possible. #roguelike #victory
NEW ENEMY: echo shades. semi-transparent. drift slowly. emit painful sonic pulses. they fade with distance. they remember what hurt them. #roguelike #ghosts
